attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement to recycle in every business/homes/private property!
attributes.background: I’m aware of many homes and business’ including private propriety’s such as flats that don’t recycle. This needs to be a legal requirement to encourage safe recycling.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/253980

There is already a legal requirement on businesses to do what they can to recycle waste. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/managing-your-waste-an-overview
